overview: Busty Lee and Suzy Nero team up in this sleazy wonder. Lee Caroll takes down a sleazy, and corrupt corporation, and in the process rises up to the power of having her own Executive Suite. Mandy’s executive sweet. Though this is probably entrapment in how she pulled this off, these guys are too mesmerized by how tight her body is to realize that they’ve ultimately been had!
title: Mandy's Executive Sweet
